subject: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit How to run the same test with different data (how about Cactus)
msgSnippet: ... You re welcome. You can t just inject a session object into your production code somewhere? Especially since HttpSession is an interface, that would make
messageBody:
zoran_101 wrote:
>
> Thanks Joe, at least now I know for sure, however my test setup
> requires me to have a valid session so I need to run my tests in
> Cactus.

You're welcome.

You can't just inject a session object into your production code
somewhere? Especially since HttpSession is an interface, that would make
life much, much easier. Did you read the session-related recipes yet? :)
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
